name: Simure Vikings
description:
Well met, Jarl. Welcome to the enchanting world of Simure Vikings. Longships filled with warriors, weapons, and tools are about set sail from Scandinavia. Will you embark on this epic saga across the seas in search of new opportunities and conquests?
This is a Viking simulation RPG that offers multiple ways to play the game. You can focus on a variety of objectives as a Viking leader: devote yourself to managing and building up your clan, expand your borders through conquests and expeditions, or even indulge in wealth with the spoils of your actions. What kind of saga will you leave behind for the skalds to sing?

Game Features:
- Live the life of a true Viking and rule as a king.
- Recruit legendary heroes to lead your armies.
- Set sail on the open seas in search of untold riches.
- Form powerful alliances with players from around the world.
- Romance partners from different cultures and backgrounds.
- Raise your children into worthy heirs and have a big happy family!

Download Simure Vikings and start your Viking saga today!
